attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tesco open a local store, replicating choices available locally forcing local stores to close. Tesco then apply for planning permission for a giant store. People refuse as they can get everything they want in the exisiting Tesco. Then Tesco gradually reduce choices in the small store. Then they try again for the big store with many choices. People cave in at this point. Tesco are creating a monoculture, bad for shoppers and farmers too.

Soon Great Britian will be a Great Big Tesco. Act now before its too late. 

"Every Little Hurts"

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
